error.thinking_budget_too_large: Maximum tokens must be greater than the thinking budget.

data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response

data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.thinking_budget_tokens: The number of tokens the model can use to think about the response out of the total maximum number of tokens. Set to 1024 or greater to enable extended thinking.
